parameters.name: ApiServerPublicEip
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to expose the API server to the Internet. Valid values:

*   true: exposes the API server to the Internet.
*   false: exposes the API server to the internal network.

parameters.name: ArgoServerEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the workflow instance UI. This parameter takes effect only if Profile is set to XFlow. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: AuditLogEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the audit log feature. Valid values:

*   true: enables the audit log feature.
*   false: disables the audit log feature.

parameters.name: IsEnterpriseSecurityGroup
parameters.description: Specifies whether to use an advanced security group.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the master instance.

parameters.name: PriceLimit
parameters.description: The limit on the prices of containers in the workflow. This parameter takes effect only if the WorkflowScheduleMode parameter is set to cost-optimized.

parameters.name: Profile
parameters.description:
The type of scenario for which the master instance is suitable. Valid values:

*   `Default`: The master instance is suitable for standard scenarios.
*   `XFlow`: The master instance is suitable for workflow scenarios.

Default value: `Default`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query available regions.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tags.

You can specify at most 20 tags in each call.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the master instance belongs. You can call the DescribeVpcs operation to query available VPCs.

parameters.name: WorkflowScheduleMode
parameters.description:
The scheduling mode of the workflow. This parameter takes effect only if Profile is set to XFlow. Valid values:

*   cost-optimized: cost-prioritized scheduling mode.
*   stock-optimized: inventory-prioritized scheduling mode.
